document.discussion_title: At Haruka Weiser funeral, mourners told to embrace her in their hearts
document.topic_text: At Haruka Weiser funeral, mourners told to embrace her in their hearts American-Statesman Sunday 24th April, 2016 The hundreds gathered Saturday for a deeply religious funeral service for the University of Texas freshman killed earlier this month were reminded that life carries with it risks, making it impossible to protect those we love.Haruka Weiser, 18, a 2015 graduate of the Arts & Communications Magnet Academy in Beaverton, was a talented dancer and member of Dance West, a student dance troupe that performs with the Oregon Symphony a few times a year.Weiser was enrolled at UT on a full dance scholarship when police say...
document.post: At Haruka Weiser funeral, mourners told to embrace her in their hearts American-Statesman Sunday 24th April, 2016 The hundreds gathered Saturday for a deeply religious funeral service for the University of Texas freshman killed earlier this month were reminded that life carries with it risks, making it impossible to protect those we love.Haruka Weiser, 18, a 2015 graduate of the Arts & Communications Magnet Academy in Beaverton, was a talented dancer and member of Dance West, a student dance troupe that performs with the Oregon Symphony a few times a year.Weiser was enrolled at UT on a full dance scholarship when police say...
